conclusion: Plan to analyze the image to understand the flow path of liquid through the baffles.
Image shows containers A, B, C, and D at the top, with baffles connecting them to containers E, F, and G at the bottom.
Liquid will flow out from containers A, B, C, and D.
Baffles are positioned between top containers and bottom containers E, F, and G.
Liquid from A will flow through the baffle to E.
Liquid from B will flow through the baffle to F.
Liquid from C will flow through the baffle to G.
Liquid from D will flow through the baffle to G.
Based on connections, liquid from A flows into E, from B into F, and from C and D into G.
